heisigStory: The child in the little red schoolhouse is there for one reason only: to study. Anyone who has gone through the schooling system knows well enough that study is one thing and learning quite another again. In the kanji, too, the character for learning (Frame 616) has nothing to do with the schoolhouse.
koohiiStory1: In the school house there are kids always studying. (BTW, atomiton, this is NOT 字).
koohiiStory2: Children in schoolhouses are there to study, nothing else!!!
myStory: học. đứa trẻ dưới mái trường ăn ten.
